commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: We're here, zura. So this is the room we'll be staying at.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Would ya look at this room? Man, no wonder this place is famous!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's so spacious, and the view is simply wonderful.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh! Th-There's a massage chair! This is heaven... This is heaven on earth!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You've got a sharp eye, Kana.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This ryokan inn is known for the gorgeous view from each of its rooms, but this room has one of the best out of all of them.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: There's an indoor public bathing area and an open-air bath, and there's a natural hot spring out in the mountains too. Supposedly, they have great skin and health benefits.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And the view from the hot springs is pretty amazing too! Once you see it, you'll never forget!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Wow! You're so well-informed! I'd expect nothing less from the daughter of a ryokan inn owner!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks, but this was nothin'!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Chika, this just fell outta your pocket. Is this...a pamphlet for the inn?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, I see now.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: A-Ahahaha... But it is pretty amazing, right? Too bad only the six of us could make it.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It really is. It's hard to find a time when all 28 of us are free...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Huh? Nico-chi, why do you have your bath set out? Are you going to the hot springs already? We just got here.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Of course I am! After all that traveling, I'm not about to waste a single millisecond of my time here. The galaxy's number one idol needs the galaxy's most beautiful skin!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: And there she goes, ever the ball of fire. Well, what do you say, everyone? Care to take a dip before dinner?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I'm on board, zura. I'm so exhausted from the train ride. I could use a nice, long bath, zura.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh, me too! I've gotta try out this super famous hot spring! Let's go, Kanata, Shizuku!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Coming!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Massages always feel better after getting nice and toasty, after all.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Then it's decided. Let's all go!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Sigh* That bath felt amazing!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The view was just as wonderful as advertised, too.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oooh my gooosh...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It's gently shaking my body all the way to my core. All my stiffness and fatigue are melting away.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: So, this is the work of a massage chair... This is truly a gift from the gods. I've seen heaven, and it's here right now!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We still have some time before dinner, huh... Hey, why don't we visit the rec room? I saw it on our way back here!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: A recreation room? That sounds fun! I wanna go, zura!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I would too. Oh, but...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Aaahhh...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Don't worry about Kana. I'll stay here with her.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You're staying here?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Yeah. We just got out of the bath, so I want to rest a little. I'll get in touch with you when it's close to dinner time, so you all go on ahead.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: All right. Thanks, Nozomi. We'll be back soon!
